argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | afveq12d.1 | |- ( ph -> F = G ) |
| 2 |  | afveq12d.2 | |- ( ph -> A = B ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_dfateq12d | |- ( ph -> ( F defAt A <-> G defAt B ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_fveq12d | |- ( ph -> ( F ` A ) = ( G ` B ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_ifbieq1d | |- ( ph -> if ( F defAt A , ( F ` A ) , _V ) = if ( G defAt B , ( G ` B ) , _V ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_dfafv2 | |- ( F ''' A ) = if ( F defAt A , ( F ` A ) , _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_dfafv2 | |- ( G ''' B ) = if ( G defAt B , ( G ` B ) , _V ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ph -> ( F ''' A ) = ( G ''' B ) ) |
